page.title: 04Local News in Strensall
page.content: Our local newspaper is the{Yorkshire {Evening Press}which is printed six miles away in the City of York.We visited the local newsagent and found that out of 1,336 houses in Strensall 2,700 papers are sold in one week, 1,800 are ordered and about 300 papers are sent back to be re-cycled.Sixteen {delivery boys and girls}are employed by the newsagent.We collected the local papers for one week and found {twenty articles about}Strensall. Some interesting articles included the story about Guendolen Kay who lives at Moor Lane,Strensall.She has driven 60yrs accident free.Another thing we did was visit the Vicar.He told us about all the organizations that write into our{local}magazine.They were Cubs School,etc.Our local Stone Mason is cutting stone for a Sheik's Palace in Dubai.Thats Strensall's local news.
